Actions.Name: Dissonant Bolt
Actions.Effects: Attack target is electrified. Electrified characters can be teleported 1.

Actions.Name: Flash Step
Actions.Description: Teleport 3, then deal 2 piercing damage to a foe in range 3.

Actions.Name: Crackling Wall
Actions.Description: The Rift Dancer creates a line 3 dangerous terrain effect in range 4. Electrified characters must save when attempting to pass into the space or be unable to move into it for the rest of the turn.
